name: The King's Gun Guy
description:
*The Windows version is way more stable*

You as the King's Gun Guy must protect him, and this shall not be a problem with you awesome mighty weapons!

This game was created by me, Leonardo Fraga, for the Ludum Dare 46. This is not the submitted project. I upgraded the first one, called "Lazy King", which I created in 72hours, then I kept working for more 3 weeks the created this game.
